```{r}
library(brms)
```

Load data

```{r}
d = read.csv("../data/clean/data.csv",
             fileEncoding = "utf-8",
             encoding = 'utf-8')
```

See https://michaelleegiordano.com/r/multilevel-modeling-in-r/

```{r}

d = d[sample(1:nrow(d),2000),]

summary(lm(AAM~ 1 + pcftr, data=d))

fit_mm <- 
  brm(AAM ~ 1 + pcftr + 
        (1 | mm(G1, G2, G3, # genuses
                weights = cbind(G1.p, G2.p, G3.p))), 
      data   = d,
      warmup = 50,
      iter   = 100,
      chains = 4,)

plot(fit_mm)
stanplot((fit_mm))
#plot(marginal_effects(fit_mm, effects = "pcftr"))

```
